title: Dish Discover
description: Dish Discover Recipe Finder is a web application built with React, designed to help users explore and discover recipes based on their available ingredients and preferences.

title: ShopSmart
description: ShopSmart is a web-based e-commerce application front-end prototype built with React. The application allows users to browse products, view product details, manage a shopping cart, and complete purchases.

title: To-Do List
description: This is a simple web-based to-do list application built using JavaScript and then converted into TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Firebase. It allows users to create, edit, and delete tasks, with real-time synchronization using Firebase Realtime Database.
